name.ja: プティカの<ruby>蟲<rt>こ</rt></ruby><ruby>惑<rt>わく</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>

text.en: Unaffected by the effects of "Hole" Normal Traps. You can only use each of the following effects of "Traptrix Pudica" once per turn. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Traptrix Orchard" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 opponent's Special Summoned monster; banish it, and if you do, during the next Standby Phase, your opponent can Special Summon 1 of their banished monsters.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Forest of the Traptrix
